<div class="titleCont "><div class="page-title"><div class="title"><span class="flag fr w32"></span><span class="flag c24 fr "></span><h1><font class="hideIfMobile">2022 &nbsp; »  &nbsp; 109th </font>Tour de France <font class="hideIfMobile">(2.UWT)</font></h1>
</div><div class="clear"></div><div class="title-line2 hideIfMobile"><font class="blue">Stage 21 (Final)</font> &nbsp; » &nbsp; <font class="red">Paris La Défense &nbsp;›&nbsp; Paris (Champs-Élysées)</font> &nbsp; <font class="red" style="font-weight: normal; ">(115.6km)</font></div><div class="imob block" style="text-align: center; letter-spacing: 0; ">2022 | Stage 21 (Final)</div><div class="imob block red  fs14" style="text-align: center; letter-spacing: 0; "><b>Paris La Défense › Paris (Champs-Élysées)</b> (115.6km)</div></div><a class="toggleSideMenu" href="">menu</a></div>

</ul>

<div class="mt40">
<div class="fs10 clr999">DNF = Did not finish<br>
DNS = Did not start<br>
OTL = Outside time limit<br>
DF = Did finish, no result<br>
NR = No result<br>
*0:00 = corrected time<br>
<span class="svg_shirt" data-color="yellow"></span>Rider wearing the jersey<br>
<span class="svg_shield"></span>&gt;50% of race distance in group before peloton<br>
<span class="followbadge">F</span> You are following this rider</div>
